attributes.additional_details: I'm asking for the government and justis servise to take a deeper look and stronger stans on a  prominant problem in family law when it comes to devorce for adulterey when children are consernd at the moment the law stands in favour for the childrens mother but whomen are taking adantage of this finanshilie by having children then comiting adultary to get rid of the father but ceep the children and forceing dad to pay maintanens then doing the same whith the next man in order to claim benifits and maintenens so thay don't haf to work I'm asking for this to be chainged so in the case of family brakdown for adulterey the adulterer looses the right to full time custerdy of the chilldren from the relashonship UNLES ITS DEEMED IN THE CHILEDS BENEFITS BY EATHER BOATH PERANTS OR THE JUSTIS SERVIS this will hellp provent damage to family life and protect children  by making all perents think bfor thay comit adulterey
